title: THE GREATEST (ISOLATED VOCALS)
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I'm trying my best
To keep you satisfied
Let you get your rest
While I stayed up all night
[Pre-Chorus]
And you don't wanna know
How alone I've been
 (How alone I've been)
Let you come and go
Whatever state I'm in, ah
[Chorus]
Man, am I the greatest
My congratulations (Ah)
All my love and patience (Huh)
All my admiration (Mm)
All the times I waited (Waited)
For you to want me naked (Naked)
Made it all look painless (Ah)
Man, am I the greatest
[Post-Chorus]
Hm
Oh-oh, hm

[Verse 2]
Doing what's right (Mm, what's right)
Without a reward (Without a reward)
And we don't have to fight (Fight, mm)
When it's not worth fighting for, mm
[Pre-Chorus]
And you don't wanna know (Don't wanna know)
What I would've done (Done), hm
Anything at all (Anything at all)
Worse than anyone (Anyone)
Hmm, ooh
[Chorus]
Man, am I the greatest (Am I the greatest)
My congratulations (Congratulations)
All my love and patience (Ah)
All my admiration (Admiration)
All the times I waited (Waited)
For you to want me naked (Naked)
I made it all look painless
Man, am I the greatest (Oh)
[Bridge]
The greatest (Oh-oh)
The greatest, ah-oh
I, I
I loved you
And I still do
Just wanted passion from you (Passion)
Just wanted what I gave you (Gave you)
I waited
And waited (Oh-oh-oh)

[Chorus]
Man, am I the greatest
God, I hate it
All my love and patience
Unappreciated
You said your heart was jaded (Mm)
You couldn't even break it (Break it)
I shouldn't have to say it (Say it)
You could've been the greatest
